title: Alexeymalutin
author: Alexeymalutin
created_time: February 26, 2023, 03:12:25 PMLast edit: March 25, 2023, 11:12:49 AM by Alexeymalutin
content: Bitcoin Talk Announcement:Introducing Solar2Crypto - The Future of Sustainable Investment!Solar2Crypto is a European company based in Bulgaria that is revolutionizing the way we invest in solar energy. The company specializes in solar plant construction and is combining the real-life business with Non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and its own token. Our goal is to offer an investment option that generates profits today and is not based on future uncertainty.Our mission is to make investment in solar energy easier and more accessible. We are selling NFTs that represent ownership of a certain amount of power generated by a solar panel. When someone buys an NFT from Solar2Crypto, they are essentially buying a part of a solar panel and the power it generates.We are offering several different investment options, or packages, ranging in size from 100 watts to 100,00 watts. The cost of each package will depend on the amount of power it includes, and the price per watt decreases as the amount of power purchased increases. People can buy an NFT for a minimum of $9.99.After the setup period, Solar2Crypto will start paying profits to investors. The profits will be paid out in two forms: 80% in USDT (Tether) and 20% in WATT, Solar2Crypto's native token. USDT is a stablecoin pegged to the value of the US dollar, while Watt is a token that can be used to buy goods and services within the Solar2Crypto ecosystem or potentially traded on cryptocurrency exchanges. Profits will be paid out on a monthly basis, and Solar2Crypto expects investors to receive a return on their investment within 36 months (3 years), but this is subject to market conditions in EU and the World.In addition to financial benefits, Solar2Crypto aims to make the project socially responsible by using the profits generated by the solar panels to benefit the community. This can be in the form of donating a portion of the profits to a charitable cause or funding community projects.WATT Token:Name: WATTSymbol: S2CTotal amount: 100,000,000 tokensBlockchain: Binance Smart ChainSolar2Crypto will create 100,000,000 tokens that will be a fixed amount and distributed as profit payment each month to NFT owners. After all tokens are distributed, the company will buy back the tokens from exchanges each month, as needed, depending on the price.Our project roadmap is as follows:March 15th (Moved to April 10) 2023 - Website launch and AirDrop of 2000 NFTs of 1 w/h ownership to our followers.March 15th  (Moved to  April 10) 2023 - Limited NFT presale starts for early adopters at a 50% discount for only 50,000 Wh in total.April 20th 2023 - Full sale phase launch of a total of 2,000,000 Wh power plant.June 1st 2023 - Token and exchange launch (Exchanges will be announced before May 1st 2023) for the community.August 1st 2023 - First profit distribution to our community.Join us today and be part of the future of sustainable investment! For more information, please visit our website. This announcement is the property of Preobrajenie LTD and can be used and distributed only by Solar2Crypto project.Note: This Announcement will be updates as the project develops. We are very open for cooperation, if you have some offers or ideas please email us. Twitter - https://twitter.com/Solar2CryptoTelegram - https://t.co/xCpVD0yXVsEmail - Office@solar2crypto.comMore info on  Our Website -> www.solar2crypto.com

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: You have piqued my curiosity on these whole solar-renewable-energy-NFT-investment-mining-and-whatnot. I am yet to give your site and --extremely short-- whitepaper a thorough read, but one thing that I specifically got interested in and decided to know more before I go to bed is your company registration as per stated on your whitepaper,  206797619, and checking them on Bulgarian Company Registry, I am a bit confused. I thought you said that your company specializes in,Quote from: Alexeymalutin on February 26, 2023, 03:12:25 PM[...]Solar2Crypto is a European company based in Bulgaria that is revolutionizing the way we invest in solar energy. The company specializes in solar plant construction and is combining the real-life business with Non-fungible tokens (NFTs) and its own token. Our goal is to offer an investment option that generates profits today and is not based on future uncertainty.[...]but the registry listed your company as,Quote from: https://portal.registryagency.bg/CR/en/Reports/ActiveConditionTabResult?uic=206797619&_x_tr_sl=auto&_x_tr_tl=en&_x_tr_hl=id&_x_tr_pto=wappTъpгoвия c кoмпютъpнo oбopyдвaнe, IT ycлyги и плaтфopми ,кaктo и вcякa дpyгa тъpгoвcкa дeйнocт, кoятo нe e зaбpaнeнa oт зaкoн, a кoгaтo имa peгиcтpaциoнeн или paзpeшитeлeн peжим - cлeд извъpшвaнeтo нa peгиcтpaциятa, cъoтвeтнo - cлeд пoлyчaвaнe нa cъoтвeтнoтo paзpeшeниe или лицeнз.I'm not good at Bulgarian, but google said,So uhh... can you perhaps explain more? Surely this is just something I misunderstood.Just in case:and, archive

comments.author: Alexeymalutin
comments.body: Quote from: lijingang on March 13, 2023, 01:30:16 PMI think it's an empty glove projectWell we will be more than happy to prove you wrong. Sent me you Polygon Wallet, and we will AirDrop you 1W NFT, than lets talk in few mounts.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: Alexeymalutin on March 16, 2023, 04:09:12 PM[...]Under Bulgarian registration requirements : Our so call main focus of the company is: Computer equipment services, It Services and It platform creation and all other league engagement allowed by the law. Basically from a legal point of view we can do anything allowed by the law in EUOnly after obtaining an extra permit for conducting the activities, I assume? So you'll still need to submit a request for an "expansion"? Or do I understand it wrong?"[...] as well as any other commercial activity that is not prohibited by law, but when there is a registration or permit regime - after registration, respectively - after obtaining the relevant permit or license."I could understand very well if a law allows business entity to work outside the sector they initially registered themselves as, but only after/with extra license. Many companies did this around the world, working outside the initial sector they registered as, but they also have the required permit to do so.But of course I can understand that Bulgaria maybe applied a different policy. Can you please help us by pointing out the specific clause on Bulgaria's constitution which state as you claimed? That you can do anything allowed by the law in EU, such as constructing and opening investment for solar energy farm, with business registered under IT services?

comments.author: Alexeymalutin
comments.body: Hello Well the law say like this, you can do any thing outside your sector, permit is needed only in some cases if a license is required by law. For example we can construct solar parks.We can sell the electricity to the government company Energo Pro AG as a mediator for power exchange. But we can sell directly to a client, for hat activity a license is needed.I will check in Trade legislation and will sent you the following paragraph
